mapping.name: mapping
mapping.sql: select distinct doc.fullName, doc.name from XWikiDocument doc, BaseObject obj where doc.fullName <> 'PhenoTips.PhenotypeMappingTemplate' and obj.name = doc.fullName and obj.className = 'PhenoTips.PhenotypeMappingClass'

property.codeToExecute:
#set ($errorMessage = '') #if ($request.doCreate == '1' && $services.csrf.isTokenValid($request.form_token)) #if ("$!{request.name.trim()}" == '') #set ($errorMessage = "$services.localization.render('phenotips.studyClass.errorMessage.blankName')") #else #set ($targetDocument = $services.model.createDocumentReference($xcontext.database, $request.space, $request.name.trim())) #if ($xwiki.exists($targetDocument)) #set ($errorMessage = "$services.localization.render('phenotips.studyClass.errorMessage.nameExists', [${request.name}])") #else #set ($params = { 'template' : $request.classTemplate, 'title' : $request.name, 'parent' : $request.parent, 'form_token' : $request.form_token, 'xredirect' : $xwiki.getURL($targetDocument, 'edit', 'editor=inline') }) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($targetDocument, 'save', "$!escapetool.url($params)")) #break #end #end #end #if ($errorMessage != '') {{error}}$errorMessage{{/error}} #end #set ($studyClassName = 'PhenoTips.StudyClass') #set ($studyTemplateName = 'PhenoTips.StudyTemplate') #set ($studiesHome = 'Studies.WebHome') {{html}}

contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.description: Whether to display the group description (true|false; defaults to false)
Whether to display the study management tools (edit, delete) for administrators (true|false; defaults to false)
How to sort the studies. Supported values: name, groups. Default: name.
How many entries to display for a list not displayed in full. Values that are not between 1 and the size of the list are interpreted as "display the entire list".
